descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#0000ff][size=5][img]http://i.imgur.com/pj4WoUN.png[/img]
[b]Current Hairstyle Count: 4
Current Version: 1.0
[/b][/size][/color][/font]This is my collection of a bunch of mixed hairstyles from popular hair packs, including KS Hairdo's Renewal, KS Hairdos - HDT Physics, ApachiiSkyHair, Yoo's HDT Merida Hair, and more. 
[b]Please note that I do not own any of the hair packs, I only smash them together.

[/b][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#00ff00][size=5][b]Description:
[/b][/size][/color][/font]Hello!  I'm so glad you decided to check out my mixed hairstyle pack.  Scroll to the bottom of the page for the FAQ.
This is my first mod for Skyrim, so go easy on me!  I'd love to have lots of constructive criticism from y'all.
There's not much of an introduction or anything.  One day, I wondered if it was possible to mix two hairstyles.  After watching the only video tutorial out there (and a good one, I might add!) I succeeded.
So...yeah. 

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffff00][size=5][b]Hairs:
[/b][/size][/color][/font][color=#ffff00][size=5][color=#ffffff][size=2][img]http://i.imgur.com/v7LUsbb.jpg[/img][b]
(HDT Physics option) The hair is either from KS Hairdo's (version) or KS Hairdos - HDT Physics (HDT version).  Requires one of the two.
[/b][img]http://i.imgur.com/3WbuAi5.jpg[/img][b]
(HDT Physics option) The hair is either from KS Hairdo's (static version) or KS Hairdos - HDT Physics (HDT version).  Requires one of the two.

[/b][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#cc0000][size=5][b]Required Mods:
[/b][/size][/color][/font]I highly suggest [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]Racemenu[/url] by Expired.  This will help stop your game from crashing when you enter the racemenu.
If you're going to get an HDT Physics version of the hair, you will need [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics.[/url][b]

[/b][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff00ff][size=5][b]FAQ

[/b][/size][/color][/font][/size][/color][/size][/color][color=#ffff00][color=#ffffff][size=2]Q: My game crashes whenever I load this!
A: Make sure you have whatever hair mod is required and also Racemenu.

Q: I downloaded the HDT version and now my hair is doing something funky?
A: I've found that exiting and re-entering the racemenu usually fixes any HDT hair problems.

Q: How do I change my hair?
A: Open up the console using the tilde (~) key and type showracemenu, then hit enter.

Q: How do I make hairs like this?
A: I suggest googling 'merging hairstyles skyrim'.  There's only one video tutorial (that I know of), and it's a really good one.

Q: Will you be adding more hairs?
A: Yes, probably.

Q: Can I request a merge between two hairs?
A: Yes, feel free!  Sometimes this mind of mine loses it's creativity when it comes to mixing hairstyles, so please do!

Q: I'm having this weird problem.
A: You can definitely tell me in the comments, but there's about a 90% chance I can't fix it.

Q: I found a bug.
A: You can still definitely tell me, but there's about an 80% chance I can't fix it, lol.  Sorry.

Q: I hate this mod!  It's not lorefriendly etc etc.
A:
[/size][img]http://i.imgur.com/NZUbRCF.gif[/img][size=2]


[/size][/color][/color][size=2]Thanks for visiting![/size]
author: MinnieBug
